event.title: Schools use cell phone jammers to ban cell phones
event.description:
Cell phone jammer bans the phone

In recent years, with the development of science and technology and the introduction of various intelligent applications, people have become increasingly dependent on high-tech equipment. In restaurants, stations, subways, streets and other public places, a group of students in school uniforms crowd together, sometimes talking and shouting, sometimes smiling and not talking, staring at the screen and smiling. Mobile phone jammers can prevent the use of mobile phones. While mobile phones bring happiness and entertainment to everyone, they are becoming the new killer of the younger generation.

https://www.jammer-mart.com/phone-blockers-jammers.html

In order to reduce the interference of electronic products on the growth of students and not affect the psychological development of minors, many countries have taken measures to limit the use of electronic products. Following bans in Italy, Greece and other countries, the French National Assembly voted on July 30, 2018 to ban the use of mobile phones on the campuses of kindergartens, elementary and secondary schools. Perhaps the best way to ban your phone is to install a wifi jammer where you need to ban it. According to the new regulations, except for teaching purposes or the special needs of children with disabilities, primary and secondary school students are not allowed to use mobile phones in classrooms or extracurricular activities.
